goods.name: Boots
goods.description: Just a plain boots to wear on your powerful heroic legs. Made from leather, comfortable enough.

goods.name: Strength potion
goods.description: You want to get you muscles bigger? Just drink this thing and gain +5 STR for 5 minutes!

goods.name: Sword
goods.description: An iron sword to cut your enemies' heads. Easy to use and pretty common item.

goods.name: Gloves
goods.description: A pair of leather gloves, nothing special. Helps you to keep your hands less dirty.

goods.name: Boots of better
goods.description: Is just a boots but a bit better than the plain boots. All the village girls will like these boots.

goods.name: Healing potion
goods.description: Some spider or maybe a wolf bit your ankle? Try this liquid out to heal your wounds. But I'd recommend you wearing some boots next time.

goods.name: Trousers
goods.description: You better acquire a pair of these. Have you seen any heroes running around in underwear only? Yeah, I know you saw some of them, but have you seen them again?

goods.name: Helmet
goods.description: This peace of steel will probably save your life if you get hit with some stick or small rock. But don't rely on it if you encounter ogres with their massive clubs.

goods.name: Green healing potion
goods.description: This healing potion is green! Probably it heals more health per use. Or less, I'm not sure.

goods.name: Lady gloves
goods.description: These gloves are for ladies and definitely not for muscular heroic men.

goods.name: Quick boots
goods.description: These boots for ones who want to go fast! They colored red, that's why they go faster than usual ones!

goods.name: Hard helmet
goods.description: This helmet feels much harder than the regular helmet, also it weighs more. But probably it would help you to survive a hit from an ogre club.

goods.name: Small sword
goods.description: Smol sword. For those who want smaller swords.

goods.name: Armor
goods.description: Finally some armor steel armor! But what's wrong with this price? Why is it so expensive&

goods.name: Herbs
goods.description: Various herbs for your druidic purposes.
